content: Big respect to her and her husband for not giving up. They showed the grit that is needed if you really want to win in life. I’ve been through the mill myself recently, caring for, and then loosing my father to cancer, rebuilding my business, and preparing to move out of the family home. It’s a lot to take on all at once, but I’ve just got on with it, because the only person who can turn my life around, is me.
